Text:
Randi Rhodes & Thom Hartmann - February 28 2011
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6212773

Stream has been problematic last couple days. Only able to get 1/2 of hour_03 for Hartmann's march 01 show. Feb. 28 & March 01 Randi Rhodes shows only have hours_01 & 02 only... Strangely, for the past couple days...hour_03 was a repeat of hour_01. So it went hr.01 to hr.02 to hr.01 again. I'm going to look for a different stream source.
